title: Emergency Airway Management Mastery Program for [K-12]

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic medical terminology and emergency response procedures
context.additional_context: Program providing systematic practical training and feedback based on cognitive load theory for learners at intermediate professional levels

learning_goals: Execute core steps of emergency airway management protocols with over 90% accuracy
Select appropriate interventions within five minutes when complex airway situations occur in simulation environments
Demonstrate technical performance skills scoring 4.0 or above in OSCE evaluations
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
